alert.note: Alert for Inland Martin; Inland St. Lucie; Okeechobee (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 22 at 2:35PM EDT by NWS Melbourne
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of southwestern St. Lucie, southeastern Okeechobee and northwestern Martin Counties through 330 PM EDT... At 234 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms near Buckhead Ridge to Okeechobee, moving northeast at 20 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Treasure Island, Indiantown, Okeechobee, Four Seasons Estates, Taylor Creek, Okee Tantie Recreation Area, Whispering Pines, Basswood Estates and Okeechobee Airport. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.

area.areaDesc: Inland Martin; Inland St. Lucie; Okeechobee
